verses.verse: Why do you stand <S%H5975><s%> far off, <S%H7350><s%> Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%> Why do you hide <S%H5956><s%> yourself in times <S%H6256><s%> of trouble? <S%H6869><s%>

In arrogance, <S%H1346><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> hunt <S%H1814><s%> down the weak. <S%H6041><s%> They are caught <S%H8610><s%> in the schemes <S%H4209><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> they devise. <S%H2803><s%>

For the wicked <S%H7563><s%> boasts <S%H1984><s%> of his heart <S%H5315><s%>'s cravings. <S%H8378><s%> He blesses <S%H1288><s%> the greedy, <S%H1214><s%> and condemns <S%H5006><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
The wicked, <S%H7563><s%> in the pride <S%H1363><s%> of his face, <S%H639><s%> has no room <S%H1875><s%> in his thoughts <S%H4209><s%> for God. <S%H430><s%>

His ways <S%H1870><s%> are prosperous <S%H2342><s%> at all times. <S%H6256><s%> He is haughty, <S%H4941><s%> and your laws are far from <S%H4791><s%> his sight. <S%H6887><s%> As for all his adversaries, he sneers at them. <S%H6315><s%>
He says <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "I shall not be shaken. <S%H4131><s%> For generations <S%H1755><s%> I shall have no trouble. <S%H7451><s%>"

His mouth <S%H6310><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of cursing, <S%H423><s%> deceit, <S%H4820><s%> and oppression. <S%H8496><s%> Under his tongue <S%H3956><s%> is mischief <S%H5999><s%> and iniquity. <S%H205><s%>

He lies <S%H3427><s%> in wait near <S%H3993><s%> the villages. <S%H2691><s%> From ambushes, <S%H4565><s%> he murders <S%H2026><s%> the innocent. <S%H5355><s%> His eyes <S%H5869><s%> are secretly set <S%H6845><s%> against the helpless. <S%H2489><s%>

He lurks <S%H693><s%> in secret <S%H4565><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%> in his ambush. <S%H5520><s%> He lies in wait <S%H693><s%> to catch <S%H2414><s%> the helpless. <S%H6041><s%> He catches <S%H2414><s%> the helpless, <S%H6041><s%> when he draws <S%H4900><s%> him in his net. <S%H7568><s%>
The helpless <S%H2489><s%> are crushed. <S%H1794><s%> They collapse. <S%H7817><s%> They fall <S%H5307><s%> under his strength. <S%H6099><s%>
He says <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "God <S%H410><s%> has forgotten. <S%H7911><s%> He hides <S%H5641><s%> his face. <S%H6440><s%> He will never <S%H5331><s%> see it. <S%H7200><s%>"
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> lift up <S%H5375><s%> your hand! <S%H3027><s%> Don't <S%H7911><s%> forget the helpless. <S%H6035><s%>
Why does the wicked <S%H7563><s%> person condemn <S%H5006><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "God won't <S%H1875><s%> call me into account?"

But you do <S%H7200><s%> see <S%H5027><s%> trouble <S%H5999><s%> and grief. <S%H3708><s%> You consider <S%H5414><s%> it to take <S%H5800><s%> it into your hand. <S%H3027><s%> You help <S%H5826><s%> the victim <S%H2489><s%> and the fatherless. <S%H3490><s%>

Break <S%H7665><s%> the arm <S%H2220><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%> As for the evil <S%H7563><s%> man, <S%H1875><s%> seek out his wickedness <S%H7451><s%> until you find <S%H4672><s%> none. <S%H1077><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is King <S%H4428><s%> forever <S%H5703><s%> and ever! <S%H5769><s%> The nations <S%H1471><s%> will perish <S%H6><s%> out of his land. <S%H776><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you have heard <S%H8085><s%> the desire <S%H8378><s%> of the humble. <S%H6035><s%> You will prepare <S%H3559><s%> their heart. <S%H3820><s%> You will cause your ear <S%H241><s%> to hear, <S%H7181><s%>
to judge <S%H8199><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the oppressed, <S%H1790><s%> that man <S%H582><s%> who is of the earth <S%H776><s%> may terrify <S%H6206><s%> no more. <S%H3254><s%>
